ygData.subject: Re: Ranger-Instill Doubt
ygData.msgSnippet: The only thing I disagree with, Xela, is this: Not enough rogues use this skill to complaint on a change for this though---- :( It s a Catch-22.
ygData.messageBody:
The only thing I disagree with, Xela, is
this:<br>"Not enough rogues use this skill to complaint on a
change for this though---- :("<br><br>It's a Catch-22.
More Rogues would, if (a) they stacked, and (b)
collecting the components wasn't such a nightmare. One of my
questions is how difficult is casters' spell research,
compared to component-collecting for poison? Anyone done
both?<br><br>One of the snaring or blinding poisons, I forget
which, requires 2 coyote tails and a BURNED OUT Greater
Lightstone. Since the BOGLS is No Rent - disappears when you
camp - you have to farm that and make the poisons all
at once. Kind of a drag.<br><br>Kharlisht<br>Dwarf
Rogue of 20-odd seasons<br>Drinal
